item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/08/26/my-welfare-responsibilities/#comment-3005">velda</a>.
Going to school, getting an education, that's part of the self-reliance responsibility. Caring for the poor and needy isn't always about money, providing service time helps as well. How each person and family does that is a decision best left to them.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to velda.

Going to school, getting an education, that’s part of the self-reliance responsibility. Caring for the poor and needy isn’t always about money, providing service time helps as well. How each person and family does that is a decision best left to them.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2009/08/26/my-welfare-responsibilities/#comment-3003">Justin Carmony</a>.
It's certainly made me re-evaluate what I'm doing to help others and how I might be able to do more.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Justin Carmony.

It’s certainly made me re-evaluate what I’m doing to help others and how I might be able to do more.

item.title: By: velda
item.dc:creator: velda
item.description: That really is a great way of putting it. Makes me feel less bad about being flat broke while I go to school.
item.content:encoded: That really is a great way of putting it. Makes me feel less bad about being flat broke while I go to school.

item.title: By: eliminar acne
item.dc:creator: eliminar acne
item.description: i agree with you, i think that is a great statement. Simple and clear, and all the people should have, without orders or religions, this kind of statements by themselves. As human persons we should take care for every one of us. great blog, Joseph, i'll keep visiting!
item.content:encoded: i agree with you, i think that is a great statement. Simple and clear, and all the people should have, without orders or religions, this kind of statements by themselves. As human persons we should take care for every one of us. great blog, Joseph, i’ll keep visiting!

item.title: By: Justin Carmony
item.dc:creator: Justin Carmony
item.description:
I like that statement a lot. Especially with all of the heated debates dealing with welfare, the government, taxes, etc, I think the real important things get lost: our personal responsibility and focusing on that.
I think I'm going to start worrying about how I personally am helping others rather than how everyone else is handling the situation. :)
item.content:encoded:
I like that statement a lot. Especially with all of the heated debates dealing with welfare, the government, taxes, etc, I think the real important things get lost: our personal responsibility and focusing on that.

I think I’m going to start worrying about how I personally am helping others rather than how everyone else is handling the situation. ðŸ™‚
